p: According to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), there is no specific recommended antiviral therapy for COVID-19. Individuals with COVID-19 require palliative care to help relieve symptoms, and those with severe disease may require care to support vital organ functions [ 9]. Intravenous drips can be used to maintain blood pressure, fluids given to manage diarrhoea and ibuprofen provided for pain relief in mild cases [ 10].
